one_reviews_text: It is not a bad game, the more I have played it the more it has seemed unbalanced & also very short. Overall though it can be very entertaining to get into but also very frustrating when I have a fully upgraded soldier ( or whatever you would like to call em' ) get 1 hit over and over and the hints are just "?" they should point or atleast be able to click and show you where/what they mean. It is enjoyable though, just keep in mind short and in time if you play it enough like me you will notice the unbalance part.

Didn't know what to expect but this ended up being a really nice tower defense game.  Played it for an hour or and enjoying it so far.  Can be very challenging if you're trying to get 3 stars on the levels but it's very addictive.  Graphics and animations are all well done.
